mapper.select: SELECT rvw.rvw_no, rvw.id, rvw.cont, rvw.cdt, rvw.score, phot.phot_no AS rvw_phot FROM rvw rvw LEFT OUTER JOIN phot phot ON rvw.rvw_no = phot.rvw_no WHERE rvw.useyn = 'Y' AND rvw.rst_no = #{rst_no} ORDER BY rvw.rvw_no DESC;
SELECT rvw.rvw_no, rvw.id, rvw.cont, rvw.cdt, rvw.score, phot.phot_no AS rvw_phot FROM rvw LEFT OUTER JOIN phot ON rvw.rvw_no = phot.rvw_no AND rvw.rvw_no = #{rvw_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rvw (rst_no, id, cont, cdt, score, useyn) VALUES ( #{rst_no}, #{id}, #{cont}, now(), #{score}, 'Y' )
